actions.name: List all Event
actions.description: Retrive all events with all data

responses.description: Returned if the user is not authoried to create an Event

resources.name: Event
resources.description: A single Event object with all its details

responses.description: Returned if is not authorized to update the Event
Returned if the Event is not found
Returned if the user is not authorized to delete the Event
Returned if the Event is not found

actions.name: List all Challenge
actions.description: Retrive all challenges with all data

responses.description: Returned if the user is not authoried to create an Challenge

resources.name: Challenge
resources.description: A single Challenge object with all its details

actions.name: Update a Challenge
actions.description: Update a single Challenge setting its challenge tokens

responses.description: Returned if is not authorized to update the Challenge
Returned if the Challenge is not found
Returned if the user is not authorized to delete the Challenge
Returned if the Challenge is not found

actions.name: List all Challenge Token
actions.description: Retrive all challenges tokens with all data for the given challenge

responses.description: Returned if the user is not authoried to create an Challenge Token

resources.name: Challenge Token
resources.description: A single Challenge Token object with all its details

responses.description: Returned if is not authorized to update the Challenge Token
Returned if the Challenge Token is not found
Returned if the user is not authorized to delete the Challenge Token
Returned if the Challenge Token is not found
